message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a fair share, but I'm hoping to get the majority.
Let's meet in the middle and split it evenly, no hard feelings!
You said let's meet in the middle, but I think I can do better than that. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
I'm starting to get a little desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. This is my final offer!
